price: So glorify your Lord with praise and be among those who prostrate [to Him][51],
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: [51] The remedy is in resorting to Allah Almighty.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
